about_the_game:
circloO is a colorful physics platformer in a growing circle. This game contains all levels from circloO and circloO 2, plus twelve brand-new bonus levels and a level editor! You can also play levels uploaded by other players from the editor! There are already over 4000 levels created by players like you!

You're a small ball rolling around in a round level. Collect circles to grow the level circle. As it grows, everything stays in the level, so you'll have to avoid and use obstacles in everchanging ways. For example, a platform that was first very useful to gain height, may prove to be a challenging obstacle after the level has grown!

You can only move left and right, so you'll want to use features of the level carefully to jump and gain height. You'll discover all sorts of physics features, such as changing gravity, a sea of tiny blocks, strange contraptions and even planets with a gravity field. In challenging parts, you'll find yourself fully immersed, pressing your arrow keys as hard as you can trying to get closer to finally collecting that next circle. But don't worry: you'll never have to start over a level, so you can always try again really quickly! And I can guarantee you'll feel amazing once you finally manage it!

With millions of plays on other platforms, circloO has been enjoyed by many and I hope you'll enjoy it too! Have fun and I'm happy to hear what you think!



circloO Complete features:
- Lots of cool physics features: ropes, pulleys, changing gravity and much more! I've included quite a few mechanics for you to discover!
- 56 fun, growing, ever more challenging levels! Can you complete the six almost-but-not-quite-impossible Hard Mode levels?
- All levels from circloO 2 and the original circloO, plus twelve brand-new levels!
- Unique physics puzzles in each level.
- Great music and sound effects by Stijn Cappetijn.
- The game will take most players two to three hours to complete. Level times are saved, so you can try to beat your own highscores and speedrun levels after that!
- Create your own levels in the level editor! Then share them with the community so everyone can enjoy them!

name: circloO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or newer (64 bit)
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: circloO is a colorful physics platformer in a round level. The level grows, so you'll have to avoid and use obstacles in everchanging ways. Enjoy a huge variety of physics challenges, from a sea of tiny blocks to planets with a gravity field! Make your own levels or play thousands of fanmade levels!
